Description: Sherd of Chian pottery chalice with post-firing graffito.
Curator's comments: This seems unlikely to be identified with 1965,0930.454.
Bibliographic references: Bernand 1970 / Le Delta égyptien d'après les textes grecs, i: les confins libyques (no. 372)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.2239)
